list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: past of will1, in various senses.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he said he would be away for a couple of days
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy nói anh ấy sẽ đi trong một vài ngày

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (expressing the conditional mood) indicating the consequence of an imagined event or situation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he would lose his job if he were identified
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta sẽ mất việc nếu anh ta được xác định

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I would love to work in Prague
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi rất thích làm việc ở Prague

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: would you pour the wine, please?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn sẽ đổ rượu, xin vui lòng?

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: expressing a conjecture, opinion, or hope.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I guess some people would consider it brutal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đoán một số người sẽ xem xét nó tàn bạo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used to make a comment about behavior that is typical.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they would say that, wouldn't they?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ sẽ nói rằng, phải không?

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: would that he had lived to finish it
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: rằng anh ấy đã sống để hoàn thành nó
